verses.verse: Moreover <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> to the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, and of <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, and of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, who should <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> with <S%H3658>harps<s%>, with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%>, and with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>: and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H582>workmen<s%> according to their service <S%H5656>was<s%>:

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>; <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>, and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and <S%H841>Asarelah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> under the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, which <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> according to the <S%H3027>order<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>; <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, and <S%H6874>Zeri<s%>, and <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%>, <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, and <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%>, under the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> with a <S%H3658>harp<s%>, to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> and to <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Of <S%H1968>Heman<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%>; <S%H1232>Bukkiah<s%>, <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>, <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>, <S%H7619>Shebuel<s%>, and <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%>, <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H2607>Hanani<s%>, <S%H448>Eliathah<s%>, <S%H1437>Giddalti<s%>, and <S%H7320>Romamti<s%>–ezer, <S%H3436>Joshbekashah<s%>, <S%H4413>Mallothi<s%>, <S%H1956>Hothir<s%>, and <S%H4238>Mahazioth<s%>:

All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2374>seer<s%> in the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%>. And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H1968>Heman<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

All these were under the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> for <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, <S%H5035>psalteries<s%>, and <S%H3658>harps<s%>, for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, according to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3027>order<s%> to <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, and <S%H1968>Heman<s%>.

So the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H251>them<s%>, with their brothers that were <S%H3925>instructed<s%> in the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even all that were <S%H995>skillful<s%>, was two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>.

And they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>, <S%H4931>custody<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H6996>custody<s%>, as well the small as the <S%H1419>great<s%>, the <S%H995>teacher<s%> as the <S%H8527>scholar<s%>.

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> for <S%H623>Asaph<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>: the <S%H8145>second<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, who with his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H7992>third<s%> to <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> to <S%H3339>Izri<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> to <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> to <S%H1232>Bukkiah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> to <S%H3480>Jesharelah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8066>eighth<s%> to <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8671>ninth<s%> to <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H6224>tenth<s%> to <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> to <S%H5832>Azareel<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> to <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> to <S%H7619>Shubael<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> to <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> to <S%H3406>Jeremoth<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8337>sixteenth<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> to <S%H3436>Joshbekashah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> to <S%H2607>Hanani<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8672>nineteenth<s%> to <S%H4413>Mallothi<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H448>Eliathah<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H1956>Hothir<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H1437>Giddalti<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H4238>Mahazioth<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:
The <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H7320>Romamti<s%>–ezer, <S%H1121>he<s%>, his sons, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>.
